languages.text: "Мои люди вели себя недостойно, и я прошу за это прощения".
"My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."
languages.original_text: "Мои люди вели себя недостойно, и я прошу за это прощения".

traits.locale_text: "My subjects acted unseemly, and I apologise for their behaviour."
"My subjects acted unseemly, and I apologise for their behaviour."
"My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."
"My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."
"My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

languages.text: “我的下属行为不端，我向你道歉。”
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: “我的下属行为不端，我向你道歉。”

languages.text: «Mi gente te ha tratado con desprecio, y te pido disculpas por ello».
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: «Mi gente te ha tratado con desprecio, y te pido disculpas por ello».

languages.text: « Mon peuple s'est mal comporté, et je vous présente mes excuses en son nom. »
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: « Mon peuple s'est mal comporté, et je vous présente mes excuses en son nom. »

languages.text: "Meine Leute haben sich abstoßend verhalten, und dafür entschuldige ich mich."
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Leute haben sich abstoßend verhalten, und dafür entschuldige ich mich."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の仲間が卑劣な振る舞いをしたな。そのことについて謝罪したい」
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の仲間が卑劣な振る舞いをしたな。そのことについて謝罪したい」

languages.text: "Soydaşlarım alçakça davrandı, bunun için özür dilerim."
languages.original_text: "My people have behaved contemptibly, and I apologise for it."

traits.locale_text: "Soydaşlarım alçakça davrandı, bunun için özür dilerim."
